name: The Long Winter Survival
description:
The long winter has begun. You must Survive and collect goods.

You can set camps or beds everywhere. If you are too cold, you should light a fire. You may get sleepy, hungry and thirsty. The most dangerous is a bear in the forest. If you can kill the bear, you can win the game. But be careful the bear is very strong. There are many animals like elephants, giraffes, snakes, cows, horses, spiders.

Survive at coldest place!
Find food to stay alive!
This is cool winter survival simulator! There are many hungry animals, try to defeat predators and survive.
Try to survive!
